title: Embroidered Picture, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk, glass beads, paper 
Technique: raised couched embroidery, beadwork embroidery
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Worked predominantly in silver gilt wrapped silk core thread, with glass beads in blue, green, yellow, red and white, on a silk ground.  The Lamb of God worked in raised laid-and-couched silver thread embroidery, on a field with beadwork flowers, vines, clusters of grapes, birds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk, glass beads, paper 
Technique: raised couched embroidery, beadwork embroidery. Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers. 2003-14-30.
